   */const progressFromMessage=msg=>{if(msg.includes('Initializing'))return 10;if(msg.includes('Checking cache'))return 25;if(msg.includes('Analyzing with AI'))return 55;if(msg.includes('Processing results'))return 75;if(msg.includes('Results ready')||msg.includes('Response ready'))return 95;if(msg.includes('Processing image'))return 35;if(msg.includes('Checking nutrition'))return 45;if(msg.includes('Analyzing nutrition'))return 60;if(msg.includes('Processing nutrition'))return 80;if(msg.includes('complete'))return 95;if(msg.includes('failed'))return 100;// will close shortly
return 40;// default midpoint
};/**

   */const autoSize=()=>{const el=document.querySelector('.search-input');if(!el)return;// Reset to default height when empty

el.style.overflowY='hidden';return;}// Otherwise handle auto-sizing as before
el.style.height="auto";const next=el.scrollHeight;el.style.height=next+"px";// Check if we've hit max height
